meanings.sent1: The bumpy car ride made me queazy.
meanings.sent2: She looked queazy after eating too much candy.
meanings.sent3: The queazy feeling in my stomach made me regret eating the whole cake.
meanings.sent4: The queazy sensation was like a rollercoaster in my stomach.
meanings.sent5: The queazy sensation lingered long after the boat ride ended.

meanings.definition: Causing a feeling of nausea or discomfort.
meanings.sent1: The queazy smell of rotten eggs filled the room.
meanings.sent2: The queazy medicine tasted bitter on her tongue.
meanings.sent3: The queazy music video made her laugh uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The queazy movie scene left a lasting impression on the audience.
meanings.sent5: The queazy ride on the old elevator was unforgettable.
